marklogic.body: It makes me sick how FG/FF/Labour Always throw the murderers, criminals..etc insults at Sinn FÃ©in. Yet Dame Edna has no problem being photographed drinking champagne with a leader whose regime has been responsible for the Cold blooded murder of 10s of millions of babies just because they were born female. Yellow belly Kenny makes me sick to my stomach. This BS about Chinese investment in the country is a load of cods whallop. All they are interested in is getting a foothold in Europe by buying our state assets at giveaway prices. It will be like taking candy from a baby. What do you expect from a bunch of failed school teachers. As they say those who can't teach go in to politics!
